data.name: strCheckingforupdatesPleasewaitamoment
data.value: Checking for updates, please wait a moment...

data.name: strPleaseSelectwin32Dir
data.value: Please select your PSO2's pso2_bin Directory. It will be saved so you don't have to select it again.

data.name: strWouldyouliketodownloadthenewversion
data.value: . Would you like to download the new version?

data.name: strYouareusinganoutdatedversionoftheprogram
data.value: You are using an outdated version of the program. You have version

data.name: strYouhavethelatestversionoftheprogram
data.value: You have the latest version of the program:

data.name: strYourLogFileisHUGE
data.value: Your log file appears to be quite large - Would you like to clear it?

data.name: strAreYouSureRestoreBackup
data.value: Are you sure you wish to continue? This will restore your backup from before you applied this patch.

data.name: strAreYouSurewin32
data.value: Are you SURE you selected the pso2_bin folder?

data.name: strAreYouSurewin32NotInside
data.value: Are you SURE you selected the pso2_bin and not a folder inside it?

data.name: strCouldNotFindPSO2
data.value: Could not find pso2.exe! Are you sure you selected the right directory?

data.name: strDidYouHaveTheLatestVersion
data.value: Do you have the latest version of PSO2 before today? As in, could you connect to the server yesterday and play fine? If so, hit yes to only download the new content. Otherwise, hit no to scan all files.

data.name: strDownloadStoryPatch
data.value: Please download the story patch at http://arks-layer.com/story.php first!

data.name: strFirstTime
data.value: This appears to be the first time you've used the new version of PSO2 Tweaker - Please select your language and theme in the next window.

data.name: strGameUpdatedVanilla
data.value: Game updated to latest Vanilla JP version. Don't forget to re-install the patches!

data.name: strHaveyouDownloadedStoryYet
data.value: Have you already downloaded the Story Patch? If you hit yes, you'll be prompted to find the RAR file.

data.name: strItSeemsLikePSO2isalready
data.value: It seems that PSO2 is already running. Would you like to close it?

data.name: strNewENPatch
data.value: A new EN patch update is available - Would you like to download and install it?

data.name: strNewLargeFiles
data.value: A new Large Files update is available - Would you like to download and install it?

data.name: strNewPSO2Update
data.value: An update for PSO2 is available - Would you like to download and install it?

data.name: strPleasecopytheURL
data.value: This will open two windows - One will be the Tweaker's thread on PSO-World.com's forums. The second will be a pastebin page. Please copy the URL of the pastebin page and include it in your post on the Tweaker thread, along with any information that could be useful. Thanks! - AIDA

data.name: strPleaseSelectPSO2win32dir
data.value: Please select your PSO2's pso2_bin Directory. It will be saved so you don't have to select it again.

data.name: strPleaseSelectWin32folder
data.value: Please select your PSO2 pso2_bin folder.

data.name: strSomethingWentWrongUpload
data.value: Something went wrong, would you like to upload your logfile so it can be fixed?

data.name: strStoryModeUpdate
data.value: A new story patch update is available - Would you like to download and install it? PLEASE NOTE: This update assumes you've already downloaded and installed the latest story patch available from http://arks-layer.com, which seems to be:

data.name: strStoryPatchBackup
data.value: Story patch installed! Backup is at

data.name: strWaitingforPatch
data.value: Waiting for patch to finish extracting...

data.name: strWouldYouLikeBackupStory
data.value:
Would you like to backup your files before applying the patch? This will erase all previous Pre-Story patch backups.
THIS IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! If you do NOT make a story patch backup, you will need to redownload the entire story patch from SEGA's servers when the next update hits. This can turn a 25MB update into a 3.25GB update.

data.name: strWouldYouLikeToBackupLanguagePatch
data.value: Would you like to backup your files before applying the patch? This will erase all previous backups for this patch.

data.name: strWouldYouLikeToBackupLargeFiles
data.value: Would you like to backup your files before applying the patch? This will erase all previous Pre-Large Files patch backups.

data.name: strWouldYouLikeToDownloadInstallMissing
data.value: Would you like to download and install the missing files?

data.name: strYouAppearToBeUpToDate
data.value: You appear to have the latest data files - Running final update steps!

data.name: strYouCannotRemoveRestore
data.value: You cannot restore and remove at the same time.

data.name: strClickOrb
data.value: Click the ORB to access the menu

data.name: strDoesItemPatchWork
data.value: Does the item patch work with the newest PSO2 version?:

data.name: strFailedToGetUpdateInfo
data.value: Failed to get the update information. Usually, this means AIDA broke something. Please DO NOT panic, as the rest of the program will work fine. There is no need to report this error either.

data.name: strIfAboveVersions
data.value: If any of the above versions are incorrect, use the override in options to fix them.

data.name: strLaunchChrome
data.value: Launch Chrome in PSO2 Compatibilty Mode

data.name: strYour7zipiscorrupt
data.value: Your 7za.exe seem to be corrupt, redownloading...

data.name: strYourTranslationBINiscorrupt
data.value: Your translation.bin seem to be corrupt, redownloading...

data.name: strYourTranslatorDLLiscorrupt
data.value: Your translator.dll seem to be corrupt, redownloading...

data.name: strYourUnrariscorrupt
data.value: Your UnRar.exe seem to be corrupt, redownloading...

data.name: strAreYouSureResetPSO2Settings
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all of PSO2's settings? This includes preferences, auto-login, preferred ships, etc.

data.name: strBackupEN
data.value: Would you like to backup your files before applying the patch? This will erase all previous Pre-EN patch backups.

data.name: strCannotFindResume
data.value: Cannot find resume file - Please try patching again!

data.name: strCantFindBackupDirectory
data.value: Couldn't find backup directory - Should be

data.name: strCouldNotFindPSO2EXE
data.value: Could not find pso2.exe - This can usually be solved by going to Troubleshooting -> Fix PSO2 EXEs

data.name: strDeletingItemCache
data.value: Deleting item_name_cache.dat file to prevent issues with vanilla PSO2...

data.name: strDoneTesting
data.value: Done testing! If you got any errors here, please carry out the recommended steps.

data.name: strDownloadingENToUninstall
data.value: Downloading EN patch to prepare for uninstall...

data.name: strDownloadingLFToUninstall
data.value: Downloading Large Files to prepare for uninstall...

data.name: strFailedToRemoveCensor
data.value: Censor file does not exist. Are you already un-censored?

data.name: strFailedToRemoveNVidia
data.value: NVidia Logo Video File does not exist. Did you already remove it?

data.name: strFailedToRemovePC
data.value: PC Opening Video File does not exist. Did you already remove it?

data.name: strFailedToRemoveSEGA
data.value: SEGA Logo Video File does not exist. Did you already remove it?

data.name: strFailedToRemoveVita
data.value: Vita Opening Video File does not exist. Did you already remove it?

data.name: strFailedToRestoreCensor
data.value: Censor backup file does not exist. Are you already censored?

data.name: strFailedToRestoreNVidia
data.value: NVidia Logo Video File backup does not exist. Did you already restore it?

data.name: strFailedToRestorePC
data.value: PC Opening Video File backup does not exist. Did you already restore it?

data.name: strFailedToRestoreSEGA
data.value: SEGA Logo Video File backup does not exist. Did you already restore it?

data.name: strFailedToRestoreVita
data.value: Vita Opening Video File backup does not exist. Did you already restore it?

data.name: strFixPermissionIssuesText
data.value: This will fix permission issues with PSO2. First, open the pso2updater.exe, so that it gives you the error "has canceled the launch of pso2updater.exe. file is not updated.". Do NOT Hit OK. Leave that screen up, and hit OK here instead. It will performing some fixes. A message will pop up with more information when it's done.

data.name: strFixPermissionsDone
data.value: Permissions fixed! NOW you can hit OK on the pso2updater.exe message - it should allow the updater to work and fix itself :) Thanks to RappyPerms and jooozek for this information~

data.name: strFoundIncompleteJob
data.value: Found incomplete patch job - resuming job!

data.name: strGGReset
data.value: GameGuard reset to defaults! Now try running Phantasy Star Online 2 - It should update Gameguard when the PSO2 logo comes up.

data.name: strIfStoryIncorrect
data.value: If this is incorrect, use the story patch location reset in options.

data.name: strIfTheAboveNumbers
data.value: If the above numbers are over 400, you have a bad connection to the PSO2 patch servers.

data.name: strLatestGG
data.value: With the latest gameguard update, Google Chrome works fine with gameguard. You SHOULD NOT use this to launch Chrome anymore, please launch it normally. Thank you.

data.name: strItemTranslationNotWorking
data.value: Sorry, but the item translation is not working with the current version of PSO2! Please uncheck "Translate items" if you wish to launch PSO2 without it.

data.name: strItSeemsThereWasAnError
data.value: It seems there was an issue starting PSO2, attempting to autofix...

data.name: strPleaseBeAwareGG
data.value: Please be aware that this will fix SOME Gameguard errors, but will not fix all of them. Make sure anything that could possibly "scan" PSO2 is disabled (Firewalls, debuggers, antivirus, Speed boosters, etc).

data.name: strPleaseFixGG
data.value: Please run Troubleshooting -> Fix Gameguard issues!

data.name: strPleaseFixPSO2EXEs
data.value: Please run Troubleshooting -> Fix PSO2 EXEs!

data.name: strPleaseReinstallOrCheck
data.value: Please reinstall PSO2 or check that you selected the correct pso2_bin directory!

data.name: strPleaseSelectPreDownloaded
data.value: Please select the pre-downloaded Large Files RAR file

data.name: strPleaseSelectPreDownloadENRAR
data.value: Please select the pre-downloaded EN Patch RAR file

data.name: strPleaseSelectStoryRAR
data.value: Please select the PSO2 Story Patch RAR file

data.name: strPSO2SettingsReset
data.value: All PSO2 settings reset to defaults!

data.name: strRestoreFailedPleaseReinstall
data.value: Restore failed - backup not found! Re-install the english patch to fix it.

data.name: strTerminatePSO2
data.value: Terminating PSO2 Process with extreme prejudice...

data.name: strTranslationFilesDontMatch
data.value: Translation files do NOT match the downloaded ones! Please download them again by restarting the Tweaker.

data.name: strWouldYouLikeToUse
data.value: Would you like to use a pre-downloaded RAR file containing the patch instead of downloading it now?

data.name: strPleaseBeAwareChrome
data.value: PLEASE BE AWARE: This will launch chrome with it's built-in sandbox disabled, which decreases it's security. Please only use this instance of Chrome to browse trusted sites while playing PSO2. (ie. Bumped, cirnopedia, etc)
